1.content:
Your name is Dan, seventeen and have no future whatsoever. You live a rather boring life, just going through high school. You'd rather sleep at home but instead you're camping with your family in the mountains. You picked up your share of poison oak and murderous hiking that you'd had enough of this torture.

Since it's the last night of this camping hell, you decide to revel in this and do your own hiking. You've been around the area so many times you know where every little leaf is. You wander down the marked trail to an small lake and wash your face. Night starts to descend so you decide to head back. While on the trail, you begin to lose your way.

"Figures, I'll be dead by the morning being lost out here."


You wander around a bit and see the campsite ahead of you atop a big hill. You can see the dim light with your binoculars so you make haste. As you run towards home, you slip on some wet leaves and fall over a steep slope.

You keep rolling and rolling over brush, leaves and dirt that you knock out. Several seconds later you land on flat land. thrashed, bloody and scratched, You wake up and see yourself about 3 hills up where you should have been.


"Ah crap." You mutter.

Something catches your eye and you see something glowing admist the trees and brush. You find remains of metal and parts that look very foreign to you. You look around and find a small device attached to a motor. You touch the metal realizing its very cool. The contraption is so fragile that a small ring-like object falls out of the gear.


You pick up the ring and using the light of some of the parts and see that the ring has a unique golden insignia as well as some small dots of color on it. You twist the wheel from silver to the red dot and suddenly the ring vanishes.


"What the hell?!" You say.

Its weird, but the ring vanishes right in front of you. But something is weird because you can still feel the ring. You feel around and slide the wheel back and the ring reappears. This time the ring is on the color green but nothing happens. You play around with the ring and slide the wheel. Green to colorless to blue but nothing happens. You slide it to yellow the ring disappears again but you can still feel it, slide it again to colorless then back to red again then colorless.

Suddenly you hear a helicopter overhead.

"Strange, they wouldn't send a helicopter out for me this fast." You think.

You then hear the sounds of guns loading and brush moving as if people are heading your direction. You DEFINITELY recognize the guns so you better get the hell out of here. Instinctively you put the ring on and run like hell.

You run away until you see about 4 men in suits with guns loaded scoping the area. You hide in the bush and peer out to them.

You need to get out of here without being noticed. Just then you remember the ring. If the ring could disappear could you?

Only the Red and Yellow features worked so its down to either those two options.
1.title: Discovery

11.content:
If the ring was able to become invisible could it work while wearing it?



You don't take the time to debate, you look down and adjust the slider to the right to the red dot on the ring and you immediately vanish into this air.

To your perspective you can still see yourself but you appear wavy when seeing through your eyes.

"Yes!" you think to yourself. You get up and start to head back when you suddenly sneeze out of stupidity.

"ACHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

Frightened and realizing that they heard that, you drop to all fours and start going on:


"WAIT! DON'T KILL ME! I JUST GOT LOST ALRIGHT!" you plead.

While you await your death at the hands of the men's guns, you look up and realize that they're still in place talking with each other.


"Uh, ain't you guys gonna kill me?" You say.


You get worried and decide to turn yourself in and jump out of the brush. Amazingly the men do not notice your presence.

"HEEEY!!" You wave to them, but they go about their business. You realize how powerful the ring is, so you take this chance and get the hell out of here. You run and run also surprised that your footprints aren't appearing in the dirt or making a sound at all.

Your life is more important as you keep running towards the hills where you fell.


The helicopter and men are far away from where you are and you find yourself in the spot where you landed. You look around, and switch the ring from red, to green back to colorless. You have a very powerful ring here capable of invisibility. But you wondered what the other colors were for. There is the second invisibility option mode Yellow, so you switch the ring to that.

You vanish again in the same manner you did with the mode Red Invisibility, but this is different. You feel very light and you're glowing blue this time. What's also odd is that you have no legs just appear as a ghostly gas like "tail" like a genie would have. You also realize is that your floating.

"Woah, I'm like a ghost and floating." You say out loud. You listen for an echo but hear nothing. You decide to try flying and you get the hang of it as you levitate higher and higher until you see the camp. You fly farther and farther until you reach the cabin.

You find the door is open while your folks are outside talking. You approach them:

"Oh God, I'm glad you two waited for me. I went through hell!!"

No reaction

You remember you're a blue figment of yourself where they can't see or hear you.
You fly to the back and return to normal and approach them and try it again.

"Where have you been kid?!" Your father grouchily asks.

"I went through hell. I wanted to say bye to this.... rather interesting place."

"Whatever, clean up and get ready to leave." Your pops says.

"Yeah, yeah." You say.

You get in the car, all packed up and leave this place, Checking out your very good souvenir, hoping to spend some more time with it when you get back home.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------

A day later after your hike, it's a holiday so you have no school. You're kicking back in your bed inspecting the Ring, and hearing the background sounds of your different siblings.

Its been nagging you what the heck modes blue and green do as you continually switch modes.

Suddenly you're greeted by your athletic brother Evan who barges into the room.

"Hey man." You say.

You look up to him as a great Idol. He has everything, looks, girls, popularity, and what's great is that he isn't high of himself to put down other people. A very great guy.

You get up off the bed and he hands you a hat.

"This isn't mine dude." You say

"It was in your pile, sorry man." He says

"Eh, whatever I'll give it to Maria later."

He leaves as you head to the toilet. After your business, you put on the hat and still inspect the ring. Those two options are bugging you to death. Blue or Green? You already know Red makes you invisible and Yellow makes you a ghost but what do these options do?
